text:
Senior C# Developer | Carma | Full-time | Onsite | Regina, SK, Canada

We are a small team of passionate individuals building state of the art technology for auto dealers. Our technology is integrated, cloud based, responsive, and a 10x improvement over existing offerings. Strong focus on great software architecture. Great salary + equity. Backed by an established Canadian auto group and part of the Microsoft BizSpark program.

One of the products we are developing is a e-commerce enabled website, a sample is here: https://www.drivecarma.ca (Try “buying” a car, or pretend to “sell” your car. The sell estimator uses machine learning behind the scenes to give a more accurate estimate.)

anthony.sarkis@drivecarma.ca Looking forward to hearing from you! Cheers, Anthony
